emailTemplate.subject: AutoSubmit Job Unexpected Failure Notice
emailTemplate.message:
The AutoSubmit job encountered a fatal error during processing and could not continue. Some attempts/submissions may have been processed successfully.
Manual intervention may be required to correct this issue. For further details, see the logs.
emailTemplate.messagehtml:
The AutoSubmit job encountered a fatal error during processing and could not continue. Some attempts/submissions may have been processed successfully.

Manual intervention may be required to correct this issue. For further details, see the logs.
